title: Empower Your Audience and Earn with Capital Academy
subtitle: Join the Capital Academy Affiliate Program and partner with a leading provider of financial education. Monetize your platform by offering your audience access to our comprehensive courses and certifications, and earn competitive commissions for every referral.

features.title: Competitive Commissions
features.description: Earn up to 25% commission on all qualifying purchases made through your referral links.

features.title: Extensive Course Library
features.description: Provide a wide range of courses covering finance, investment, and personal development.

features.title: Trusted Educational Provider
features.description: Align with a reputable institution known for high-quality content and recognized certifications.

features.title: Marketing Support
features.description: Access professionally designed banners, text links, and valuable promotional content to enhance your marketing efforts.

features.title: Promote

features.description: Receive commissions for every purchase made through your referral link.

whoCanJoin.title: Who Can Join?
whoCanJoin.subtitle: We welcome applications from bloggers, influencers, educators, and website owners with audiences interested in finance, investment, and professional growth. Whether you have a niche blog, a popular YouTube channel, or a professional network, partnering with Capital Academy offers value to your followers and a revenue opportunity for you.

title: Investing in Your Future
subtitle: At Capital Academy, we believe that knowledge should be accessible to everyone, no matter their financial situation. Twice a year, we offer scholarships to help passionate learners take their skills to the next level with free access to our premium courses. Scholarship recipients will receive a one-year Capital Academy membership, granting full access to our Self-Study programs, career-building resources, and mentorship opportunities.

features.description: Scholarships are awarded twice a year to outstanding applicants who demonstrate dedication to their learning and career growth.
Winners receive a full-year membership with unlimited access to our industry-leading finance courses and training materials.
Announcements are made in March and September, with recipients notified via email.

apply.title: Apply for a Scholarship
apply.subtitle: If youâ€™re ready to level up your career with the support of Capital Academy, submit your application below. Our team reviews each submission carefully, selecting candidates who show passion and commitment to professional growth.
apply.note: Individuals with a current or previous paid Capital Academy subscription are not eligible for this scholarship.

title: Our Commitment to Empowering Communities
subtitle: At Capital Academy, we believe that education is a powerful catalyst for social change. Our mission extends beyond providing top-tier financial education; we are dedicated to making a meaningful impact in underserved communities by offering accessible learning opportunities and resources.

grantProgram.title: Capital Academy Grant Program
grantProgram.subtitle: To bridge the educational gap, the Capital Academy Grant Program donates annual memberships to accredited charitable organizations serving communities in need. This initiative ensures that individuals, regardless of their circumstances, have the opportunity to enhance their financial literacy and professional skills.

features.title: Over 1,000 Organizations Supported
features.description: Apply to join the Capital Academy Affiliate Program through our simple registration process.

educationalPartnerships.subtitle: Collaboration is key to amplifying our impact. Capital Academy partners with various organizations to develop tailored educational programs that address specific community needs. These partnerships enable us to deliver relevant and impactful content to diverse audiences.

diversityEquity.subtitle: We are committed to fostering an inclusive environment that celebrates diversity. Our DEI initiatives focus on creating equitable opportunities within our organization and the communities we serve, ensuring that everyone has access to quality financial education.

title: Capital Academy Full Code of Ethics
subtitle: Our Code of Ethics outlines the guiding principles that Capital Academy members, candidates, and Charter holders are expected to uphold. These principles ensure that all financial professionals maintain integrity, transparency, and accountability in their professional conduct.

coreEthics.title: Core Ethical Principles
coreEthics.subtitle: By adhering to our Code of Ethics, you commit to:

features.title: Integrity and Transparency
subtitle: Act with honesty, fairness, and transparency in all professional dealings.
Avoid any misrepresentation of information regarding your services, fees, or performance.

features: Act with honesty and professionalism in all interactions.

title: Capital Academy Standards of Professional Conduct
subtitle: The Standards of Professional Conduct guide Capital Academy members, candidates, and Charterholders in maintaining integrity, professionalism, and accountability in all professional activities. These standards ensure fair treatment of clients, uphold industry best practices, and foster trust in global capital markets.

features.title: Acting in the Clientâ€™s Best Interest
features.description: Always prioritize clients' interests over personal gain or employer pressures. Uphold honesty, transparency, and diligence in your professional actions.

features.title: Confidential Information
features.description: Safeguard client information unless disclosure is legally required. Never exploit non-public information for personal advantage.

features.title: Market Manipulation
features.description: Refrain from engaging in deceptive practices that manipulate market prices, trading volumes, or investor decisions.

features.title: Knowledge of the Law
features.description: Understand and comply with local, regional, and international laws governing investment practices. Follow the stricter rule if regulations conflict.

features.title: Independence and Objectivity
features.description: Avoid conflicts of interest by refusing gifts, compensation, or benefits that could compromise professional judgment.

features.title: Accuracy and Integrity
features.description: Ensure all investment reports, marketing materials, and communications are factual, unbiased, and free from exaggeration.

features.title: Continuing Education
features.description: Commit to ongoing professional development to stay informed on industry trends, legal updates, and ethical advancements.

features.title: Loyalty, Prudence, and Care
features.description: Prioritize client interests by exercising diligence, caution, and sound judgment when managing investments.

features.title: Fair Dealing
features.description: Treat all clients equally in investment opportunities, disclosures, and recommendations.

features.title: Suitability
features.description: Ensure investment strategies align with a clientâ€™s financial objectives, risk tolerance, and personal circumstances.

features.title: Confidentiality
features.description: Maintain strict client confidentiality unless legally required to disclose information.

features.title: Trustworthiness and Loyalty
features.description: Act in your employerâ€™s best interests while maintaining professional independence.

features.title: Additional Compensation
features.description: Obtain written consent before accepting any compensation or benefits that may create a conflict of interest.

features.title: Supervisory Responsibilities
features.description: Ensure compliance with Capital Academyâ€™s Code of Ethics and all applicable regulations within your organization.

features.title: Diligence and Reasonable Basis
features.description: Conduct comprehensive research and analysis before making investment recommendations or decisions.

features.title: Clear Client Communication
features.description: Clearly explain investment processes, risks, and potential returns to clients. Disclose any changes that may impact their investments.

features.title: Record Keeping
features.description: Maintain detailed records of all investment decisions, communications, and client instructions.

features.title: Disclosure of Conflicts
features.description: Fully disclose potential conflicts that could compromise your objectivity or judgment.

features.title: Priority of Transactions
features.description: Always prioritize client transactions before personal trades.

features.title: Referral Fees
features.description: Disclose any referral fees received for recommending products or services to ensure clients are informed of potential biases.

features.title: Relationships with Other Professionals
features.description: Avoid accepting fees for services that clients are already entitled to through their employer or financial institution.

enforcement.title: Enforcement and Accountability
enforcement.subtitle: Failure to adhere to these standards may result in disciplinary actions, including written warnings, suspension, or permanent revocation of certification. Capital Academy maintains a strict review process to ensure professional conduct is upheld across all members.
